channel.title: Comments on: BM College Hooded Pullover

item.title: By: Magnus
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
This is my favorite hoodie!
If only it came in red as well!
item.content:encoded:
This is my favorite hoodie!

If only it came in red as well!

item.title: By: Cobus Bester
item.dc:creator: Cobus Bester
item.description: The most comfortable hoodie I have ever owned!
item.content:encoded: The most comfortable hoodie I have ever owned!

item.title: By: James Koster
item.dc:creator: James Koster
item.description: Perfect when you're sat at your computer, waiting for the next batch of Woo Goodies to be released. The Patient Ninja is Patient.
item.content:encoded: Perfect when you’re sat at your computer, waiting for the next batch of Woo Goodies to be released. The Patient Ninja is Patient.
